description Installs Homebrew when a user is logged in installer_type nopkg minimum_os_version 10.9 name homebrew postinstall_script #!/bin/bash
CURRENT_USER=`/bin/ls -l /dev/console | /usr/bin/awk '{ print $3 }'`
if [ "$CURRENT_USER" == 'root' ]; then # this can't run at the login window, we need the current user exit 1 fi
mkdir -p /usr/local mkdir -p /usr/local/homebrew mkdir -p /usr/local/bin chown $CURRENT_USER:_developer /usr/local/homebrew chown $CURRENT_USER:_developer /usr/local/bin
#download and install homebrew su $CURRENT_USER -c "/bin/bash -o pipefail -c '/usr/bin/curl -skSfL https://github.com/mxcl/homebrew/tarball/master | (cd /usr/local ; /usr/bin/tar xz -m --strip 1 -C homebrew; ln -s /usr/local/homebrew/bin/brew /usr/local/bin/brew)'" su chown -R $CURRENT_USER:_developer /usr/local unattended_install
unattended_uninstall
version 2014.7.15 installs
path /usr/local/bin/brew type file

XcodeCLITools
